MarkedMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

MarkedMod:GainBlockOnApplyMarkPower.NAME: Pin Point Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: Mark whenever an enemy deals attack damage to you.

MarkedMod:DanceOfDeathStance.NAME: Dance of Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies take additional damage from attacks equal to half their Mark. Apply 1 Mark each time you deal attack damage to an enemy. Upon entering this stance, loose all of your Block. You cannot gain Block while in this stance. Exit this Stance at the start of your next turn.
